content: MetaTodo: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance

Add error code constant BRP_ERROR_CODE_INVALID_REQUEST = -23402 to src/brp_tools/constants.rs
Build and fix any compile errors after adding constants
Rename PORT_DESCRIPTION to DESC_PORT in src/tools.rs for consistency
Rename FILE_PATH to PARAM_FILE_PATH in src/tools.rs for consistency
Build and fix any compile errors after renaming constants
Replace hardcoded '/jsonrpc' with BRP_JSONRPC_PATH in brp_client.rs and watch_task.rs
Replace hardcoded 'localhost' with BRP_DEFAULT_HOST in relevant files
Replace hardcoded 'http' with BRP_HTTP_PROTOCOL in relevant files
Replace hardcoded port 15702 with DEFAULT_BRP_PORT in test files
Replace hardcoded error code -23402 with BRP_ERROR_CODE_INVALID_REQUEST
Build and fix any compile errors after replacements
Move JSON-RPC constants from src/tools.rs to src/brp_tools/constants.rs
Update all imports that use JSON-RPC constants
Build and fix any compile errors after moving constants

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
Fix any clippy issues (remove dead code, don't use _ prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
STOP work and prepare for code review subagent task
Task new subagent to review changes focusing on duplication and complexity (read-only)
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
